channel.title: CVE Feed for Hughes Network Systems -- WL3000 Fusion Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hughes Network Systems -- WL3000 Fusion Software

item.title: CVE-2024-39278|2024-09-06T13:26:53.933Z -- hughes%20network%20systems -- wl3000%20fusion%20software
item.description: Credentials to access device configuration information stored unencrypted in flash memory. These credentials would allow read-only access to network configuration information and terminal configuration data.

item.title: CVE-2024-42495|2024-09-06T13:26:24.838Z -- hughes%20network%20systems -- wl3000%20fusion%20software
item.description: Credentials to access device configuration were transmitted using an unencrypted protocol. These credentials would allow read-only access to network configuration information and terminal configuration data.
